about_the_game:
In 1969, mankind established its first link to the Aethernet. Humanity soon entered a golden age of technological wonder and prosperity.
But, kept secret from the eyes of the public, a second discovery was made shortly after... demons weren't just the subject of myths and religion.
To combat them, the Demonic Anomalies Termination Agency was born. An FBI offshoot where agents are partnered with daemons through a pact, their mission: send the demons back where they belong.

Experience a day in their shoes!

GAMEPLAY

In this fixed camera action game you'll take control of a rookie DATA agent tasked with eliminating rampaging demons.
Battles take place in real-time, requiring you to dodge enemy attacks and find the perfect time to retaliate against them. As you shoot enemies you'll gain mana which you can use to cast spells to gain an advantage. On the verge of death will you choose to use what little mana you have to heal yourself, or will you try to blast away one of your foes so the battle becomes easier? Make strategic use of your resources and complete your mission!

FEATURES:

  • Supports both modern camera relative controls and classic tank controls, as well as full input rebinding
  • Tutorial mission to introduce you to the game's controls and features
  • An assortment of bonus challenges to test your skills against various demons

content_descriptors.notes: Contains guns, stylized blood, and dead people.

Minimum:
  • OS: 7
  • Processor: i5-4590

  • Graphics: GTX 1060 3GB

short_description: Take on the role of a special agent and fight against digital demons from the Aethernet with your Daemon partner. This time, you're tasked with rescuing a civilian in their apartment... Destroy all demons and ensure their safety!
